fields.description: Data types supported by validation rule

system_object_types.name: is_not_empty
system_object_types.description: Checks whether a value was provided for a field

system_object_types.name: minimum_length
system_object_types.description: Validates minimum required length of the text value
system_object_types.message: Text length cannot be smaller than {0}. The actual length is {1}

parameters.name: length
parameters.display_name: Length greater than or equal to
parameters.description: Minimum required length of the text value

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Actual size of the text value

system_object_types.name: maximum_length
system_object_types.description: Validates maximum allowed length of the text value
system_object_types.message: Text length cannot be greater than {0}. The actual length is {1}

parameters.name: length
parameters.display_name: Length less than or equal to
parameters.description: Maximum allowed length of the text value

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Actual size of the text value

system_object_types.name: value_is_in_list
system_object_types.description: Checks that the value of the field is identical to one of the values in the list
system_object_types.message: The value should be one of this {list}

system_object_types.name: value_is_in_query
system_object_types.description: Checks that the value of the field is identical to one of the values in the list retured by a query
system_object_types.message: The value should be one of this {list}

fields.name: availability_characteristics
fields.description: Degree to which something is available for use

fields.name: functional_quality
fields.description: What is the functional quality of the application?

system_object_types.title: Add auto generated ID to all objects
system_object_types.description: Add auto generated ID (e.g. GUID) to all objects including object types. Use ID in link association types

fields.name: application
fields.description: Application, which the subscription plan is for
